title: CryptopreneurBrainboss
author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
created_time: October 22, 2022, 12:03:53 AMLast edit: November 21, 2022, 04:15:18 AM by CryptopreneurBrainboss
content: Betfury.io: the leading social bitcoin casino is looking to hire approximately 40 active participates of the community to help spread the word about their casino through your signature ad space. If you believe to be qualify for this role, drop your application below and it'll be reviewed. Don't forget to visit BetFury's ANN thread to drop your review or know more about our casino.Rules and Requirements:• Applicants must have been very active in the last 30 days for your application to be considered valid.• Minimum of 5 merits in last 120 days before applying.• Wear our Signature & Avatar before or after acceptance into campaign.• Write a minimum of 20 constructive posts each week that you participate in campaign in order to receive payment.• Write a minimum of 5 constructive posts in the Gambling section each week in order to receive payment. These 5 gambling posts will count towards the 20 post Min weekly requirement.• Maximum of 5 posts (2 gambling posts included) will be eligible for daily post count.• Posts in Local boards, Off-Topic, Games and Rounds, any bounty/campaign threads as well as threads where your Signature isn't displayed will not count towards eligible posts.• Users with legitimate negative feedback from a DT member aren't allowed in campaign.• Receiving a legitimate negative feedback from a DT member gets you removed automatically without pay from campaign.• Alt accounts aren't welcomed in campaign, abusers caught will be punished with red tag and no payment.• Removal of signature/avatar within the week results to no payment.• Each payment will be sent directly to your bech32 BTC and BNB smartchain address by Betfury's Team on Tuesday within 3-5PM (Week will run from 12:00 AM Mondays ends Sundays 11:59 PM (Forum time).This Campaign will be open for Full Members +.• BetFury.io reserves the right to stop or alter this campaign at any time.Payouts and Positions:10x Full Members - $40/week {$20 BTC & $20 BFG}10x Sr. Members - $50/week {$25 BTC & $25 BFG}20x Hero/Legendary Members -  $70/week {$35 BTC & $35 BFG}Payments will be sent 50/50 in (BTC/BFG) therefore you're required to provide both your BTC & BNB smartchain address.BFG is currently listed on Coinmarketcap and trading on this exchanges.  Application Format:Code: Bitcointalk Username:Current post count (Including this one):bech32 BTC Address:BNB Smartchain address:Merit in the last 120 days:Avatar :Link : comments.author: Xiaomie A1
comments.body: I don't intend to interfere in this because every decision is in the hands of the manager, but it would be better if the participants who applied could read the rules and if the conditions such as merit were not sufficient, then there was no need to bother to make an application.Quote from: Spack17 on October 22, 2022, 12:08:04 AMMerit in the last 120 days: 0Quote from: maydna on October 22, 2022, 02:48:55 AMMerit in the last 120 days: 1Quote from: Invester on October 22, 2022, 03:39:49 AMMerit in the last 120 days: 2Quote from: CryptopreneurBrainboss on October 22, 2022, 12:03:53 AM• Minimum of 5 merits in last 120 days before applying.And I saw that there were also two participants who were wrong in writing down the amount of merit for the 120 days they got. And in this case I just want to tell the truth for both of them.Quote from: Die_empty on October 22, 2022, 12:50:40 AMMerit in the last 120 days: 335Quote from: Cryptomultiplier on October 22, 2022, 12:14:02 AMMerit in the last 120 days: 114I just want to give the best advice to everyone without having any intentions here
